00016 typedef uint64_t ub8; 
00017 typedef uint32_t ub4; 
00018 typedef uint16_t ub2; 
00019 typedef unsigned char ub1; 
00020 #define hashsize(n) ((ub8)1<<(n))
00021 #define hashmask(n) (hashsize(n)-1)
00022 #define mix(a,b,c) \
00023 { \
00024   a -= b; a -= c; a ^= (c>>13); \
00025   b -= c; b -= a; b ^= (a<<8); \
00026   c -= a; c -= b; c ^= (b>>13); \
00027   a -= b; a -= c; a ^= (c>>12);  \
00028   b -= c; b -= a; b ^= (a<<16); \
00029   c -= a; c -= b; c ^= (b>>5); \
00030   a -= b; a -= c; a ^= (c>>3);  \
00031   b -= c; b -= a; b ^= (a<<10); \
00032   c -= a; c -= b; c ^= (b>>15); \
00033 }
00034 #define mix64(a,b,c) \
00035 { \
00036   a=a-b;  a=a-c;  a=a^(c>>43); \
00037   b=b-c;  b=b-a;  b=b^(a<<9); \
00038   c=c-a;  c=c-b;  c=c^(b>>8); \
00039   a=a-b;  a=a-c;  a=a^(c>>38); \
00040   b=b-c;  b=b-a;  b=b^(a<<23); \
00041   c=c-a;  c=c-b;  c=c^(b>>5); \
00042   a=a-b;  a=a-c;  a=a^(c>>35); \
00043   b=b-c;  b=b-a;  b=b^(a<<49); \
00044   c=c-a;  c=c-b;  c=c^(b>>11); \
00045   a=a-b;  a=a-c;  a=a^(c>>12); \
00046   b=b-c;  b=b-a;  b=b^(a<<18); \
00047   c=c-a;  c=c-b;  c=c^(b>>22); \
00048 }
00049 
00050 template <class KeyType>
00054 class HashFunction {
00055 private:
00056         static const ub4 init_pattern_1 = 0x00000000;
00057         static const ub4 init_pattern_2 = 0x13572468;
00058 
00059         static ub4 calcHash(register const char *k, register uint32_t length,
00060                         register uint32_t initval) {
00061                 register uint32_t a, b, c, len;
00062                 /* Set up the internal state */
00063 
00064                 len = length;
00065                 a = b = 0x9e3779b9; /* the golden ratio; an arbitrary value */
00066                 c = initval; /* the previous hash value */
00067                 /*---------------------------------------- handle most of the key */
00068                 while (len >= 12) {
00069                         a += (k[0] +((uint32_t)k[1]<<8) +((uint32_t)k[2]<<16)
00070                                         +((uint32_t)k[3]<<24));
00071                         b += (k[4] +((uint32_t)k[5]<<8) +((uint32_t)k[6]<<16)
00072                                         +((uint32_t)k[7]<<24));
00073                         c += (k[8] +((uint32_t)k[9]<<8) +((uint32_t)k[10]<<16)
00074                                         +((uint32_t)k[11]<<24));
00075                         mix(a,b,c);
00076                         k += 12;
00077                         len -= 12;
00078                 }
00079                 /*------------------------------------- handle the last 11 bytes */
00080                 c += length;
00081                 switch (len) /* all the case statements fall through */
00082                 {
00083                 case 11:
00084                         c+=((uint32_t)k[10]<<24);
00085                 case 10:
00086                         c+=((uint32_t)k[9]<<16);
00087                 case 9:
00088                         c+=((uint32_t)k[8]<<8);
00089                         /* the first byte of c is reserved for the length */
00090                 case 8:
00091                         b+=((uint32_t)k[7]<<24);
00092                 case 7:
00093                         b+=((uint32_t)k[6]<<16);
00094                 case 6:
00095                         b+=((uint32_t)k[5]<<8);
00096                 case 5:
00097                         b+=k[4];
00098                 case 4:
00099                         a+=((uint32_t)k[3]<<24);
00100                 case 3:
00101                         a+=((uint32_t)k[2]<<16);
00102                 case 2:
00103                         a+=((uint32_t)k[1]<<8);
00104                 case 1:
00105                         a+=k[0];
00106                         /* case 0: nothing left to add */
00107                 }
00108                 mix(a,b,c);
00109 
00110                 /*-------------------------------------------- report the result */
00111                 return c;
00112         }
00113 
00114 public:
00115         static const int PRIME = 1048583; // often used in computing hash value. Big prime number.
00116 
00117         static const ub8 DEFAULT_SEED_VALUE = 0x9e3779b97f4a7c13LL;
00118         static ub8 hashFN64(const KeyType& key, ub8 seed = DEFAULT_SEED_VALUE) {
00119                 register ub1 *k = (ub1 *)key.c_str();
00120                 register ub4 length = key.size();
00121                 register ub8 a, b, c;
00122                 register ub4 len;
00123 
00124                 /* Set up the internal state */
00125                 len = length;
00126                 a = b = seed; /* the golden ratio; an arbitrary value */
00127                 c = 0x7902cac39f392d18LL;
00128 
00129                 /*---------------------------------------- handle most of the key */
00130                 while (len >= 24)
00131                 {
00132                         a += (k[0] +((ub8)k[1]<<8) +((ub8)k[2]<<16) +((ub8)k[3]<<24)
00133                                         +((ub8)k[4]<<32)+((ub8)k[5]<<40)+((ub8)k[6]<<48)+((ub8)k[7]<<56));
00134                         b += (k[8] +((ub8)k[9]<<8) +((ub8)k[10]<<16) +((ub8)k[11]<<24)
00135                                         +((ub8)k[12]<<32)+((ub8)k[13]<<40)+((ub8)k[14]<<48)+((ub8)k[15]<<56));
00136                         c += (k[16] +((ub8)k[17]<<8) +((ub8)k[18]<<16)+((ub8)k[19]<<24)
00137                                         +((ub8)k[20]<<32)+((ub8)k[21]<<40)+((ub8)k[22]<<48)+((ub8)k[23]<<56));
00138                         mix(a,b,c);
00139                         k += 24; len -= 24;
00140                 }
00141 
00142                 /*------------------------------------- handle the last 11 bytes */
00143                 c += length;
00144                 switch(len) /* all the case statements fall through */
00145                 {
00146                         case 23 : c+=((ub8)k[22]<<56);
00147                         case 22 : c+=((ub8)k[21]<<48);
00148                         case 21 : c+=((ub8)k[20]<<40);
00149                         case 20 : c+=((ub8)k[19]<<32);
00150                         case 19 : c+=((ub8)k[18]<<24);
00151                         case 18 : c+=((ub8)k[17]<<16);
00152                         case 17 : c+=((ub8)k[16]<<8);
00153                         /* the first byte of c is reserved for the length */
00154                         case 16 : b+=((ub8)k[15]<<56);
00155                         case 15 : b+=((ub8)k[14]<<48);
00156                         case 14 : b+=((ub8)k[13]<<40);
00157                         case 13 : b+=((ub8)k[12]<<32);
00158                         case 12 : b+=((ub8)k[11]<<24);
00159                         case 11 : b+=((ub8)k[10]<<16);
00160                         case 10 : b+=((ub8)k[9]<<8);
00161                         case 9 : b+=k[8];
00162                         case 8 : a+=((ub8)k[7]<<56);
00163                         case 7 : a+=((ub8)k[6]<<48);
00164                         case 6 : a+=((ub8)k[5]<<40);
00165                         case 5 : a+=((ub8)k[4]<<32);
00166                         case 4 : a+=((ub8)k[3]<<24);
00167                         case 3 : a+=((ub8)k[2]<<16);
00168                         case 2 : a+=((ub8)k[1]<<8);
00169                         case 1 : a+=k[0];
00170                         /* case 0: nothing left to add */
00171                 }
00172                 mix(a,b,c);
00173                 /*-------------------------------------------- report the result */
00174                 return c;
00175         }
00176 
00177         static ub8 generateHash64 (const KeyType& key) {
00178                 const char *token = key.c_str();
00179                 const unsigned int len = key.size();
00180                 ub8 id = 0L;
00181                 ub8 id1, id2;
00182                 id1 = calcHash (token, len, init_pattern_1);
00183                 id2 = calcHash (token, len, init_pattern_2);
00184                 id = (id1 << 32) | id2;
00185 
00186                 return id;
00187         }
00188 
00189         static ub4 generateHash32 (const KeyType& key) {
00190                 const char *token = key.c_str();
00191                 const unsigned int len = key.size();
00192 
00193                 return calcHash (token, len, init_pattern_1);
00194         }
00195 
00196         static ub4 convert_key(const KeyType& key) {
00197                 register ub4 convkey = 0;
00198                 register const char* str = (const char*)key.c_str();
00199                 for (register size_t i = 0; i < key.size(); i++)
00200                 convkey = 37*convkey + *str++;
00201 
00202                 return convkey;
00203         }
00204 
00205         static ub4 djb2(const KeyType& key) {
00206                 register ub4 h = 5381;
00207                 register const char* str = (const char*)key.c_str();
00208                 for (register size_t i = 0; i < key.size(); i++, str++)
00209                 h = ((h << 5) + h) + *str++;
00210                 return h;
00211         }
00212 
00213         static ub4 sdbm(const KeyType& key) {
00214                 register ub4 h = 0;
00215                 register const char* str = (const char*)key.c_str();
00216                 for (register size_t i = 0; i < key.size(); i++)
00217                 h = *str++ + (h << 6) + (h << 16) - h;
00218                 return h;
00219         }
00220 };

00222 template<typename KeyType> inline ub4 sdb_hashing(const KeyType& key) {
00223         using namespace izenelib::am::util;
00224 
00225         DbObjPtr ptr(new DbObj);
00226         write_image(key, ptr);
00227         uint32_t convkey = 0;
00228         const char* str = (const char*)ptr->getData();
00229         for (size_t i = 0; i < ptr->getSize(); i++)
00230                 convkey = 37*convkey + (uint8_t)*str++;
00231         return convkey;
00232 }
00233 
00234 template<class T> struct HashFunctor {
00235         size_t operator()(const T& key) const {
00236                 using namespace izenelib::am::util;
00237                 DbObjPtr ptr(new DbObj);
00238                 write_image(key, ptr);
00239                 uint32_t convkey = 0;
00240                 const char* str = (const char*)ptr->getData();
00241                 for (size_t i = 0; i < ptr->getSize(); i++)
00242                         convkey = 37*convkey + (uint8_t)*str++;
00243                 return convkey;
00244         }
00245 };
00246 
00247 inline uint32_t sdb_hash_fun(const void* kbuf, const size_t ksize) {
00248         uint32_t convkey = 0;
00249         const char* str = (const char*)kbuf;
00250         for (size_t i = 0; i < ksize; i++)
00251                 convkey = 37*convkey + (uint8_t)*str++;
00252         return convkey;
00253 }
00254 
00255 template<typename KeyType> inline ub4 izene_hashing(const KeyType& key) {
00256         char* ptr = 0;                  
00257         size_t ksize;                   
00258         izene_serialization<KeyType> izs(key);                          
00259         izs.write_image(ptr, ksize);
00260 
00261         uint32_t convkey = 0;
00262         for (size_t i = 0; i < ksize; i++)
00263                 convkey = 37*convkey + (uint8_t)*ptr++;
00264         return convkey % HashFunction<KeyType>::PRIME;
00265 }
00266 
00267 template<class T> struct izene_HashFunctor {
00268         size_t operator()(const T& key) const {
00269             return izene_hashing( key );
00270         }
00271 };
